Barclays Bank has decided to change the way your get charged for using their overdraft facilities, they say it's to make charges clearer however if you look at a overdraft of just over £2000 you would pay only £30 in interest a month.

With their new policy this would rise to £3 a day so that would be £84 for 28 days, that's an increase of £54.

The notice they have given is only 2 months! The Government should should make Barclays Bank to change that policy and differ it so anyone who wants to cut their overdraft down has more time than putting them into more poverty.
